alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rapides and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Flatwoods to Lacamp. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hineston, Lacamp, Leander, Sieper, Hutton, Clifton, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Calcasieu, and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
